title: Find an Old Article for a Follow-Up Story
description: A reporter is writing a follow-up to a story published five years ago and needs to find the original article in the digital archive.

tasks.description: Search the digital archive using keywords and a date range.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the original article.

tasks.description: Retrieve the full text and original publication date of the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the necessary information for the follow-up story.

tasks.description: Find any related photos or videos that were published with the original story.
